news.title: Google leads monster week for tech, pushing megacaps to combined $21 trillion in market cap
news.summary: Eight trillion-dollar companies now make up a combined 36% of the S&P 500. Tech's megacaps got bigger this week.

news.title: FTC commissioner questions status of Snap AI chatbot complaint: 'People deserve answers'
news.summary: President Trump attempted to remove Slaughter from her FTC position, but a U.S. appeals court allowed her to maintain her role. The FTC is a federal agency that regulates interstate commerce.

news.title: Kenvue stock drops 10% on report RFK Jr. will link autism to Tylenol use during pregnancy
news.summary: HHS will release a report that could draw a link between pain medication and autism. The report will be released this month, according to the Wall Street Journal.

news.title: Mystery of former Federal Reserve Governor Kugler's resignation deepens as real estate records raise new questions

news.title: Elliott's plan for PepsiCo includes investing in some of its iconic brands, shedding others
news.summary: Elliott Investment Management says PepsiCo neglected its core soda brands and is selling way too many products. Elliott Investment Management: PepsiCo has neglected itscore soda brands.

news.title: Apple’s iPhone events have been unimpressive lately. Will this year be the exception?
news.summary: Some on Wall Street believe a thin new iPhone could help Apple break the pattern. The tech giant’s stock usually slumps after its big hardware reveals.

news.title: From bad to worse? Another big jobs report is coming up — and it probably won’t look good either.
news.summary: The jobs report is coming out in just a few more days. And the news probably won't be good. Don’t look now, but another big jobs report will be coming out soon.

news.title: My mother, 81, discovered her ‘millions’ in investments are gone. What can I do?
news.summary: “She’s a very proud woman,” her daughter says of her mother. “I’m very proud of her,’ she adds.

news.title: I’m about to inherit a lot of money. How do I make sure my husband doesn’t get any of it?
news.summary: “We want to invest the money and play catch up with our retirement savings/funding,” he says. “We’re trying to get ahead of the game,’ he adds.
